00026 #include "lpc17xx_i2s.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00039 #define BUFFER_SIZE                     0x400
00040 
00044 #define I2S_BUFFER_SRC                  LPC_AHBRAM1_BASE
00045 
00049 #define I2S_BUFFER_DST                  (I2S_BUFFER_SRC+0x1000UL)
00050 
00051 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLE ***********************/
00052 uint8_t menu[]=
00053         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00054         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00055         " I2S polling mode demo \n\r"
00056         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00057         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00058         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00059         " Use two I2S channels in the same board to transfer data in polling mode\n\r"
00060         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00061 
00062 volatile uint8_t  I2STXDone = 0;
00063 volatile uint8_t  I2SRXDone = 0;
00064 
00065 volatile uint32_t *I2STXBuffer = (uint32_t*)(I2S_BUFFER_SRC);
00066 volatile uint32_t *I2SRXBuffer = (uint32_t *)(I2S_BUFFER_DST);
00067 
00068 volatile uint32_t I2SReadLength = 0;
00069 volatile uint32_t I2SWriteLength = 0;
00070 
00071 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00072 void Buffer_Init(void);
00073 Bool Buffer_Verify(void);
00074 void print_menu(void);
00075 
00076 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00077 /*********************************************************************/
00082 void Buffer_Init(void) {
00083         uint32_t i;
00084 
00085         for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00086                 I2STXBuffer[i] = i+1;
00087                 I2SRXBuffer[i] = 0;
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*********************************************************************/
00097 Bool Buffer_Verify(void) {
00098         uint32_t i;
00099         uint32_t *pTX = (uint32_t *) &I2STXBuffer[0];
00100         /* Generally, first element of RX buffer is a dummy data, so
00101          * it will be discarded
00102          */
00103         uint32_t *pRX = (uint32_t *) &I2SRXBuffer[1];
00104 
00105         for (i = 1; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00106                 if (*pTX++ != *pRX++)  {
00107                         return FALSE;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         return TRUE;
00111 }
00112 
00113 /*********************************************************************/
00118 void print_menu(void)
00119 {
00120         _DBG_(menu);
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00125 /*********************************************************************/
00130 int c_entry (void) {
00131         uint32_t i;
00132         uint32_t dummy=0;
00133         I2S_MODEConf_Type I2S_ClkConfig;
00134         I2S_CFG_Type I2S_ConfigStruct;
00135         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00136 
00137         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00138          * – 115200bps
00139          * – 8 data bit
00140          * – No parity
00141          * – 1 stop bit
00142          * – No flow control
00143          */
00144         debug_frmwrk_init();
00145 
00146         //print menu screen
00147         print_menu();
00148 
00149         Buffer_Init();
00150 
00151         /* Pin configuration:
00152          * Assign:      - P0.4 as I2SRX_CLK
00153          *                      - P0.5 as I2SRX_WS
00154          *                      - P0.6 as I2SRX_SDA
00155          *                      - P0.7 as I2STX_CLK
00156          *                      - P0.8 as I2STX_WS
00157          *                      - P0.9 as I2STX_SDA
00158          */
00159         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00160         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00161         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00162         PinCfg.Pinnum = 4;
00163         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00164         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00165         PinCfg.Pinnum = 5;
00166         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00167         PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00168         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00169         PinCfg.Pinnum = 7;
00170         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00171         PinCfg.Pinnum = 8;
00172         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00173         PinCfg.Pinnum = 9;
00174         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00175 
00176         I2S_Init(LPC_I2S);
00177 
00178         //Setup for I2S: RX is similar with TX
00179         /* setup:
00180          *              - wordwidth: 16 bits
00181          *              - stereo mode
00182          *              - master mode for I2S_TX and slave for I2S_RX
00183          *              - ws_halfperiod is 31
00184          *              - not use mute mode
00185          *              - use reset and stop mode
00186          *              - select the fractional rate divider clock output as the source,
00187          *              - disable 4-pin mode
00188          *              - MCLK ouput is disable
00189          *              - Frequency = 44.1 kHz (x=8,y=51 - automatic setting)
00190          * Because we use mode I2STXMODE[3:0]= 0000, I2SDAO[5]=0 and
00191          * I2SRX[3:0]=0000, I2SDAI[5] = 1. So we have I2SRX_CLK = I2STX_CLK
00192          * --> I2SRXBITRATE = 1 (not divide TXCLK to produce RXCLK)
00193          */
00194 
00195         /* Audio Config*/
00196         I2S_ConfigStruct.wordwidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00197         I2S_ConfigStruct.mono = I2S_STEREO;
00198         I2S_ConfigStruct.stop = I2S_STOP_ENABLE;
00199         I2S_ConfigStruct.reset = I2S_RESET_ENABLE;
00200         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_MASTER_MODE;
00201         I2S_ConfigStruct.mute = I2S_MUTE_DISABLE;
00202         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00203 
00204         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_SLAVE_MODE;
00205         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00206 
00207         /* Clock Mode Config*/
00208         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK;
00209         I2S_ClkConfig.fpin = I2S_4PIN_DISABLE;
00210         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_DISABLE;
00211         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_TX_MODE);
00212         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_RX_MODE);
00213 
00214         /* Set up frequency and bit rate*/
00215         I2S_FreqConfig(LPC_I2S, 44100, I2S_TX_MODE);
00216         I2S_SetBitRate(LPC_I2S, 0, I2S_RX_MODE);
00217 
00218         I2S_Start(LPC_I2S);
00219          while(I2STXDone == 0||I2SRXDone == 0){
00220                 if(I2STXDone ==0){
00221                          I2S_Send(LPC_I2S,I2STXBuffer[I2SWriteLength]);
00222                          I2SWriteLength +=1;
00223                          if(I2SWriteLength == BUFFER_SIZE) I2STXDone = 1;
00224                 }
00225                 if(I2SRXDone == 0)
00226                 {
00227                         while(I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE)==0x00);
00228                         if(dummy == 0) //dummy receive
00229                         {
00230                                 i = I2S_Receive(LPC_I2S);
00231                                 dummy = 1;
00232                         }
00233                         else
00234                         {
00235                                 *(uint32_t *)(&I2SRXBuffer[I2SReadLength]) = I2S_Receive(LPC_I2S);
00236                                 I2SReadLength +=1;
00237                         }
00238                         if(I2SReadLength == BUFFER_SIZE) I2SRXDone = 1;
00239                 }
00240          }
00241 
00242          /* print received data */
00243          _DBG_("Receive Buffer data: ...");
00244          for(i=0;i<BUFFER_SIZE;i++)
00245          {
00246                  _DBH32(I2SRXBuffer[i]);_DBG_("");
00247          }
00248 
00249          /* Validate received data */
00250          if(Buffer_Verify())
00251          {
00252                  _DBG_("Verify Buffer: OK...");
00253          }
00254          else
00255          {
00256                  _DBG_("Verify Buffer: ERROR...");
00257          }
00258          I2S_DeInit(LPC_I2S);
00259          while(1);
00260 }
00261 
00262 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00263    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00264    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00265    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00266    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00267 int main(void)
00268 {
00269     return c_entry();
00270 }
00271 
00272 #ifdef  DEBUG
00273 /*******************************************************************************
00274 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00275 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00276 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00277 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00278 * @return               None
00279 *******************************************************************************/
00280 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00281 {
00282         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00283          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00284 
00285         /* Infinite loop */
00286         while(1);
00287 }
00288 #endif
